title: Late Night Lit: Hua Hsu | Elissa Bassist
description:
This month on Late Night Lit, Late Night supervising producer Sarah Jenks-Daly talks to Hua Hsu, a New Yorker editor whose new book Stay True: A Memoir explores friendship, grief, the search for self, and the solace that can be found through art.

Then, she talks to Elissa Bassist, author of the very funny and poignant Hysterical: A Memoir.

Finally, Chelsea Clinton offers a book recommendation backstage at Studio 8G during her recent appearance on Late Night.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
